title: Creating another Hydrashare
body: I wish to fork and tinker with Hydra. Are all the files needed to build and run a Hydrashare website already on this repository?

title: change full update to only parsing the updated forks
body:
- [x] make authenticated Github API calls 
- [x] make a static version of current Hydras.  Currently the script exceeds 5 minutes limit of google scripts.
- [ ] update current script to only check the repositories that are updated after the *last_update*
- [ ] change insert to append and remove. Append the new ones and remove the ones that has been removed!

title: Not all examples are being displayed for a given fork
body: I have noticed that various examples are missing when we refresh the repo data.  I believe the data is refreshed a couple of times per hour but it appears the data that comes back is not consistent as some of my examples are randomly hidden hour to hour.  It appears the bug is that not all folders in each fork are properly pulled and posted.

title: Link comments to Ladybug Tools forum

body: Automate the process of creating a topic for each hydra on discourse so people can ask their questions and get answers. We don't really check the comments here.

title: Rewrite the back-end to be more stable and handle more hits

milestone.title: Patreon goal improvements
milestone.description: The Improvements to be addressed as a part of meeting our Patreon goal!

body:
I have noticed this issue for quite some time that the main hydrashare display page will include duplicate files at the bottom of the page and other example files that should be on this page do not display:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5567574/24932520/de0b7ec4-1edf-11e7-9093-e12d9e3025d2.png)

For example, I cannot find my Urban Weather Generator file on the main page right now because of this.

I have noticed that the missing files change with time and I guess this main page is just failing to find all of the files that it should.  I just wanted to put this up here in case anyone had any ideas about it.  Maybe we should try refreshing this page every 30 minutes instead of 15 minutes to see if this has any effect.

title: Dynamo Customizer to Hydra
body: @alfarok is possible to link [Dynamo Customizer](http://dynamobim.com/dynamo-customizer-beta-now-available/) to Hydra? We can add a new key to input.json where user can share the link and then we can embed the page in Hydra. That will be pretty cool IMO.
